name: BlockBalance3D
description:
FULL SCREEN + CLICK A BLOCK IN TOP TO START PLAYING

L-Click to Place     R-Click to Delete

Q-E to rotate Vertical     A-D to rotate Horizontal

W-S to Zoom

Scroll to move Up/Down

Objective: Reach the blue goal before 35 seconds is up, every time you reach it it moves up and resets the 35 seconds. Try to beat my high score of 99 :)
